attributes.action: Doctors to resume face to face appointments
attributes.background: Reinstate face to face doctors appointments

rejection.details:
Decisions about whether to offer face-to-face appointments are clinical and operational matters for individual GP practices and the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament. There is currently no Government-imposed restriction on such appointments taking place.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
